name: Elda
description: A radiant fairy with shimmering, rainbow-hued wings. Guides and assists the player by granting transformations, providing hints, and dispelling small areas of dark magic.
lore: Hailing from the Realm of Rainbows, Elda escaped its corruption and now helps restore balance. She is kind and wise, though sorrowful for her lost home.

abilities.name: Player Transformations
abilities.description: Temporarily grants player unique forms (e.g., fireproof form).

abilities.name: Rainbow Light
abilities.description: Dispels small areas of dark magic.

abilities.name: Hints and Recipes
abilities.description: Offers cryptic crafting advice and puzzle hints.

appearance.size: Tiny, about the size of a human hand.
appearance.wings: Delicate, shimmering, dragonfly-like wings with subtle rainbow hues.
appearance.hair: Long golden hair, cascading like sunlight.
appearance.clothing: A dress of glowing, color-shifting petals.
appearance.glow: A soft, warm light radiates from her, brightening with excitement or magic use.
